entry.title: cosmic_watch
entry.content:
Location 1：The first floor of the school’s basement (indoor, concrete)

Image:


Average number of signals per sampling time: 0.393

Number of signals(numbers:times): 0:43, 1:14, 2:5, 3:1

Time between signals: Lowest:0.397(10), highest:8.34(1). Most data have
short interval

Average time:Decreasing trend

Signal amplitude:Highest: 100, lowest: 3. random amplitude, less data at
high amplitudes

Location 2：The fifth floor of the school’s building (indoor, concrete)

Image:


Average number of signals per sampling time: 0.686

Number of signals(numbers:times): 0:37, 1:16, 2:6, 3:3

Time between signals: Lowest:0.367(19), highest:7.70(1). Most data have
short interval

Average time:Decreasing trend with a sharp increase in between

Signal amplitude:Highest: 97.02, lowest: 0.98 random amplitude

Location 3：Caohejin High-tech park

Image:



Average number of signals per sampling time: 0.539

Number of signals(numbers:times): 0:45, 1:22, 2:8, 3:1

Time between signals:Lowest:0.429(19), highest:9.00(1). Most data have
short interval

Average time:Decrease and Increase

Signal amplitude:Highest: 96.1, lowest: 0.75 random amplitude, a vacancy
in low amplitude

Location 4：Xuhui Riverside Park

Image:

Average number of signals per sampling time: 0.474

Number of signals(numbers:times): 0:47, 1:22, 2:7

Time between signals: Lowest:0.254(9), highest:5.33(1). Most data have
short interval

Average time:No obvious trend

Signal amplitude: Highest: 97.02, lowest: 2.94 random amplitude

Location 5：Jing An Temple

Image:

Average number of signals per sampling time: 0.293

Number of signals(numbers:times): 0:60, 1:20, 2:2

Time between signals:Lowest:0.420(3), highest:8.83(1). Most data have
short interval

Average time:Decreasing and increasing

Signal amplitude: Highest: 96.02, lowest: 0.91 random amplitude

Location 6：The bund

Image:

Average number of signals per sampling time:0.592

Number of signals(numbers:times): 0:1, 1:26, 2:8, 3:1

Time between signals:Lowest:0.291(12), highest:6.11(1). Most data have
short interval

Average time:A sharp decrease and no obvious trend

Signal amplitude: Highest: 99.1, lowest: 1 random amplitude

Location 7：The Oriental Pearl TV Tower

Image:

Average number of signals per sampling time:0.524

Number of signals(numbers:times): 0:39, 1:15, 2:9

Time between signals:Lowest:0.477(19), highest:1.017(1). Most data have
short interval

Average time:Seems increase, some sharp drop

Signal amplitude: Highest: 96.08, lowest: 0.96 random amplitude

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
